name: SuperMega: The Game
description:
.

" SuperMega: The Game " is a fan-made video game developed in around the span of 2-months. I learned alot making this project and hope fellow SuperMega fans enjoy it! All of the art, music, and programming took way to long, and I got wayy to into this.

-Summary: Play as Matt or Ryan in a 30-40 minute 2D adventure driven platforming-brawler where you defeat bad guys,  fight 3 different bosses, and enjoy humorous situations.

-WARNING: Game does contain foul language and references, would not advise playing with children unless skipping all dialogue, but probably just don't play it with them at all. 

-SOUNDTRACK: HERE

[Controls]

  • C - Interact
  • X - Attack
  • Z - Dash
  • Arrow Keys- movement

[Directions on Installation]

  1.  Download "SuperMegaTheGame.zip"
  2.  Place file on Desktop (or wherever)
  3.  Extract file
  4.  Open "SuperMega TheGame.exe"
  5.  Enjoy!
